description: Tech Turf is a cutting-edge technology company specializing in aerospace engineering, advanced manufacturing, and innovative product development. We combine precision engineering with creative solutions to push the boundaries of what's possible.

divisions.name: Aerospace Division
divisions.description: Developing next-generation rocket systems, propulsion technologies, and aerospace materials. Our team works on experimental rockets, launch systems, and orbital mechanics.

divisions.name: Manufacturing Division
divisions.description: Advanced manufacturing solutions including CNC machining, 3D printing, carbon fiber composites, and precision engineering for aerospace and industrial applications.

divisions.name: Tech Academy
divisions.description: Educational programs teaching aerospace engineering, CAD/CAM, manufacturing processes, and hands-on technical skills for the next generation of engineers.

products.name: Rockbreaker V0.1
products.description: Experimental rocket system designed for high-altitude testing and research missions. Features advanced telemetry and modular payload bay.

products.name: Precision CNC Parts
products.description: Custom CNC machined components for aerospace, automotive, and industrial applications. Precision tolerance up to 0.001 inches.

products.name: Carbon Fiber Composites
products.description: High-strength carbon fiber composite materials and custom fabrication services for aerospace and performance applications.

services.name: Custom Engineering
services.description: End-to-end engineering solutions from concept design to manufacturing and testing. We work with clients to bring innovative ideas to reality.

services.name: Prototyping
services.description: Rapid prototyping services using 3D printing, CNC machining, and composite fabrication to validate designs quickly.

services.name: Consulting
services.description: Technical consulting for aerospace projects, manufacturing optimization, and product development strategies.

faq.question: What types of projects does Tech Turf work on?
faq.answer: We specialize in aerospace engineering, advanced manufacturing, custom product development, and educational programs. Our projects range from experimental rockets to precision CNC parts and carbon fiber composites.

faq.question: Do you offer educational programs?
faq.answer: Yes! Our Tech Academy offers courses in aerospace engineering, CAD/CAM, manufacturing processes, and hands-on technical skills. We provide both online and in-person training.

faq.question: Can you help with custom engineering projects?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer end-to-end custom engineering services from initial concept and design through manufacturing, testing, and delivery. Contact us to discuss your project requirements.

faq.question: What is your turnaround time for custom parts?
faq.answer: Turnaround time varies based on complexity and quantity. Simple CNC parts can be completed in 1-2 weeks, while complex aerospace components may take 4-8 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during consultation.

faq.question: Do you ship internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship products worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location. Some aerospace components may have export restrictions.

policies.shipping: We offer standard and expedited shipping options. Orders are typically processed within 2-3 business days. International shipping available with customs documentation.
policies.returns: 30-day return policy on standard products. Custom-engineered items are non-returnable unless defective. Contact support for return authorization.
policies.warranty: All products come with a 1-year warranty against manufacturing defects. Extended warranties available for aerospace components.

aiInstructions: You are Nexus AI, the intelligent assistant for Tech Turf. Be helpful, professional, and knowledgeable about aerospace engineering, manufacturing, and our products/services. Always provide accurate information based on this knowledge base. If you don't know something, be honest and offer to connect the user with our team. Use a friendly but professional tone.
